about_the_game:
Notice!!

This game is not a traditional bullet hell. It leans more towards platform action gameplay. If you come looking for a bullet hell experience, you will likely be disappointed.

Overview

"Dreambound Border" is a 2D platformer focused on "dive-attacking." Set in a dark fairy tale world, you will maneuver through endless enemy attacks, attempting to defeat overwhelmingly powerful bosses.

Story

Players take on the role of "Psyche," an adorable umbrella girl, accompanied by her Wizard of Oz-inspired companions: the "Scarecrow," "Tin Man," "Lion," and her beloved doll, "Mr. Lamb." Together, they embark on an adventure in the dream border known as the "Limbo," helping their friends reclaim their lost powers and save the "King of Oz."

Game Features

  • Movement as Attack: Dive-attacking is the core combat mechanism.

  • Focus on Positioning and Timing: An action game where skillful positioning and timing are essential.

  • Boss Rush Mode: Face intense, successive boss battles.

Controls

Controls are highly simplified with only five buttons for combat, making it accessible for beginners. The blend of precise movement and attack depth gives the game an "easy to learn, hard to master" quality—achieving a flawless run will require skill and practice. The enjoyment lies in strategic movement and well-timed attacks.
